sentences.sContent: The company went into receivership with massive debts.
sentences.sCn: 该公司负债累累，已经由破产管理人接管。

synos.tran: [经管]破产管理；破产管理人的职务；破产在管

remMethod.val: receiver(破产案产业管理人) + ship(职位) → 破产管理

trans.tranCn: 破产管理， 破产在管； 破产管理人的职务
trans.tranOther: if a business is in receivership, it is controlled by an official receiver because it has no money
